detail: Cox's Bazar sea beach is the longest sea beach in the world.
Kuakata is a town in southern Bangladesh known for its panoramic sea beach.
Keokradong is a peak located in Bandarban, Bangladesh.
Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal.
It is said the name Sreemangal (or Srimangal) is named after Sri Das and Mangal Das; two brothers who settled on the banks of the Hail Haor.
Rangamati is the administrative headquarters of Rangamati Hill District in the Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh.
